description: The Anthropogenic Biomes of the World, Version 1 data set describes globally-significant ecological patterns within the terrestrial biosphere caused by sustained direct human interaction with ecosystems, including agriculture, urbanization, forestry and other land uses.
title: Anthropogenic Biomes
citation:
Ellis, E. C. and N. Ramankutty. 2008. Putting people in the map: anthropogenic
biomes of the world. http://ecotope.org/anthromes/
